strapiPost.title: Toy Drive, Lane Closures, and Nature Center Opening Collide in Big Week Ahead For Springdale
strapiPost.content:
• Starting Monday, Dec. 7, overnight lane closures on I-49 will be in place from 8pm to 7am, and extend through Friday of this week.
  • The Festival of Stars Toy and Donations Drive will begin on Friday, Dec. 11 in Springdale. Donors are encouraged to remain inside their car with a mask on while dropping off a new or used toy or monetary donation. Drop-off will be open from 6am to 6pm, at Arkansas Children's Northwest in Springdale.
  • The Arkansas Game and Fish Commission is showcasing the new Ozark Highlands Nature Center in Springdale starting Dec. 11. Tickets are free, but reservations will be timed and limited. Reserve HERE
